title: Notwithstanding the above restriction as stated in TableNo
clause_text: Notwithstanding the above restriction as stated in TableNo. 15, any telematics equipment storage or erection facility can have a height as required for effective functioning of that system.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Notwithstanding the above restriction as stated in TableNo. 15, any telematics equipment storage or erection facility can have a height as required for effective functioning of that system.
